Description: On I-95 at mile marker 152.5 in the County of Prince William, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The south left shoulder and left lane are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 169.4 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The south right outside lane and right shoulder are closed.

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 139.2 in the County of Stafford, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right shoulder is closed.
